languages.text: "Он не слушается. Это последствия той проклятой миссии на Тассере, или техножрецам пришлось перевести его на базовые протоколы?.. Да какая уже разница! Мой пес! Я даже не могу отдать ему последний приказ! Почему именно сейчас, Глейто?"

"He is not listening to me. Is this the aftermath of that damned mission on Thassera, or did the Tech-Priests have to reset him to basic protocols? Throne, what difference does it make? My dog! I can't even give him one last order! Why now, Glaito?"
languages.original_text: "Он не слушается. Это последствия той проклятой миссии на Тассере, или техножрецам пришлось перевести его на базовые протоколы?.. Да какая уже разница! Мой пес! Я даже не могу отдать ему последний приказ! Почему именно сейчас, Глейто?"

traits.locale_text: "He does not listen to me. Is this the aftermath of that damned mission on Thassera, or did the tech-priests have to reset him to basic protocols? What difference does it make? My dog! I can't even give him one last order! Why now, Glaito?"

"He is not listening to me. Is this the aftermath of that damned mission on Thassera, or did the Tech-Priests have to reset him to basic protocols? Throne, what difference does it make? My dog! I can't even give him one last order! Why now, Glaito?"

"He is not listening to me. Is this the aftermath of that damned mission on Thassera, or did the Tech-Priests have to reset him to basic protocols? Throne, what difference does it make? My dog! I can't even give him one last order! Why now, Glaito?"

languages.text: 「俺の言うことを聞かない。あの忌々しいタッセーラでの任務の後遺症なのか、それとも技術司祭が基本プロトコルにリセットしたからなのか？玉座よ、何の意味がある？俺の犬だ！最後の命令すら出せない！グライト、なぜ今に限って！」
languages.original_text: "He is not listening to me. Is this the aftermath of that damned mission on Thassera, or did the Tech-Priests have to reset him to basic protocols? Throne, what difference does it make? My dog! I can't even give him one last order! Why now, Glaito?"

traits.locale_text: 「俺の言うことを聞かない。あの忌々しいタッセーラでの任務の後遺症なのか、それとも技術司祭が基本プロトコルにリセットしたからなのか？玉座よ、何の意味がある？俺の犬だ！最後の命令すら出せない！グライト、なぜ今に限って！」

languages.text: "Er hört nicht auf mich. Sind das Folgen dieser verdammten Mission auf Thassera, oder haben die Techpriester ihn auf die Basisprotokolle zurückgesetzt? Beim Thron, was spielt das noch für eine Rolle? Mein Hund! Ich kann ihm nicht einmal einen letzten Befehl erteilen! Warum jetzt, Glaito?"
languages.original_text: "He is not listening to me. Is this the aftermath of that damned mission on Thassera, or did the Tech-Priests have to reset him to basic protocols? Throne, what difference does it make? My dog! I can't even give him one last order! Why now, Glaito?"

traits.locale_text: "Er hört nicht auf mich. Sind das Folgen dieser verdammten Mission auf Thassera, oder haben die Techpriester ihn auf die Basisprotokolle zurückgesetzt? Beim Thron, was spielt das noch für eine Rolle? Mein Hund! Ich kann ihm nicht einmal einen letzten Befehl erteilen! Warum jetzt, Glaito?"

languages.text: « Il ne m'obéit plus. Est-ce là la conséquence de cette maudite mission sur Thassera, ou les technoprêtres ont-ils réinitialisé tous les protocoles ? Par le Trône, qu'est-ce que ça peut bien changer ? Mon chien ! Je ne peux même pas lui donner un dernier ordre ! Pourquoi maintenant, Glaito, pourquoi ? »
languages.original_text: "He is not listening to me. Is this the aftermath of that damned mission on Thassera, or did the Tech-Priests have to reset him to basic protocols? Throne, what difference does it make? My dog! I can't even give him one last order! Why now, Glaito?"

traits.locale_text: « Il ne m'obéit plus. Est-ce là la conséquence de cette maudite mission sur Thassera, ou les technoprêtres ont-ils réinitialisé tous les protocoles ? Par le Trône, qu'est-ce que ça peut bien changer ? Mon chien ! Je ne peux même pas lui donner un dernier ordre ! Pourquoi maintenant, Glaito, pourquoi ? »

languages.text: «No me hace caso. ¿Serán las secuelas de esa maldita misión en Thassera, o quizá los tecnosacerdotes deban restablecer sus protocolos básicos? Por el Trono, ¿qué más da? ¡Es mi perro, y ni siquiera puedo darle una última orden! ¿Por qué ahora, Glaito?».
languages.original_text: "He is not listening to me. Is this the aftermath of that damned mission on Thassera, or did the Tech-Priests have to reset him to basic protocols? Throne, what difference does it make? My dog! I can't even give him one last order! Why now, Glaito?"

traits.locale_text: «No me hace caso. ¿Serán las secuelas de esa maldita misión en Thassera, o quizá los tecnosacerdotes deban restablecer sus protocolos básicos? Por el Trono, ¿qué más da? ¡Es mi perro, y ni siquiera puedo darle una última orden! ¿Por qué ahora, Glaito?».

languages.text: “它不肯服从我的命令。这究竟是塔瑟拉那场该死的任务造成的后果，还是那些技术神甫重置基础协议搞出来的问题？黄金王座在上，这又有什么区别呢？它是我的狗！可它却不愿听从我最后的命令！你为什么偏要挑这种时候出问题，格雷托？”
languages.original_text: "He is not listening to me. Is this the aftermath of that damned mission on Thassera, or did the Tech-Priests have to reset him to basic protocols? Throne, what difference does it make? My dog! I can't even give him one last order! Why now, Glaito?"

traits.locale_text: “它不肯服从我的命令。这究竟是塔瑟拉那场该死的任务造成的后果，还是那些技术神甫重置基础协议搞出来的问题？黄金王座在上，这又有什么区别呢？它是我的狗！可它却不愿听从我最后的命令！你为什么偏要挑这种时候出问题，格雷托？”

languages.text: "Artık beni dinlemiyor. O lanet görevden sonra mı oldu yoksa Tekno Rahipler onu temel protokollere mi sıfırladı acaba? Taht aşkına, ne fark eder ki? Köpeğim! Ona son bir emir bile veremiyorum! Neden şimdi Glaito?"
languages.original_text: "He is not listening to me. Is this the aftermath of that damned mission on Thassera, or did the Tech-Priests have to reset him to basic protocols? Throne, what difference does it make? My dog! I can't even give him one last order! Why now, Glaito?"

traits.locale_text: "Artık beni dinlemiyor. O lanet görevden sonra mı oldu yoksa Tekno Rahipler onu temel protokollere mi sıfırladı acaba? Taht aşkına, ne fark eder ki? Köpeğim! Ona son bir emir bile veremiyorum! Neden şimdi Glaito?"
